attributes.title: Absolute trash
attributes.review: Somehow I managed to download an app about supporting some kind of Oompa Loompa. I wouldn’t recommend unless you’re into racism, orange people, stupidity, and sexual predators. 0/10 worst app I’ve ever downloaded, not worth it.

attributes.title: MAKE APPS GREAT AGAIN!!!
attributes.review: This app was a HUGE disappointment. HUGE. What happened to apps being great? This app was the WORST. Probably made by someone from the US. Not trustworthy at ALL. Please remove this app IMMEDIATELY!!! We have to make apps great again!!!

attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review: Glitchy, difficult to get to work properly, took several days to download. All in all not worth the 0$ I paid

attributes.title: Absolutely awful..
attributes.review: Do not get this app, when it downloaded, a creeper blew up my Minecraft dog and my phone exploded. I would give it no stars if I could. I have to write this on a potato now.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: Smh so many bugs and gave my phone a VIRUS now every time I open the app I see a picture of an orange??? Anyways if I could give this app a zero star rating I would, it’s so confusing to use. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!!

attributes.title: Worthless
attributes.review: It is just a black screen when you open it. You don’t get any information on it.

attributes.title: Awful!
attributes.review: I opened it and it crashed my phone!!  I’ve tried multiple times now and nothing is working!!

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: It was crazy downloaded the app suddenly my little brother was getting set on fire and my phone speaking languages I didn’t understand I was so scared

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: This app is useless it took so long to download and once it downloaded it made my phone glitch. Do not get this app not worth your phone space at all!

attributes.title: IT GAVE ME A VIRUS (not clickbait)
attributes.review: this is not at all related to a tiktok i saw, and when i downloaded this app it actually gave me not one but 17 viruses and i am currently writing this review on my nintendo cause my phone no longer works
